message: I want to order a pepperoni pizza and a chicken cordon bleu sub, along with some chicken wings

Great! I found Pepperoni for AED 43.0 and Chicken Cordon Bleu for AED 28.0 on our menu. Chicken Wings are available at AED 23.0 each.

Would you like to place an order for this item? Please respond with 'yes' to confirm or 'no' to cancel.

If you would like to proceed, please provide your RFID Number (6 digits - located at back bottom right of your NYU card after the + sign), Building Number (from the following options: "A1A", "A1B", "A1C", "A2A", "A2B", "A2C", "A3", "A4", "A5A", "A5B", "A5C", "A6A", "A6B", "A6C", "A1", "A2", "A3", "A4", "A5", "A6", "F1", "F2", "C1", "C2", "C3"), Phone Number (UAE format), and any special requests for your order.

Great! I found Pepperoni for AED 43.0 and Chicken Cordon Bleu for AED 28.0 on our menu. Chicken Wings are available at AED 23.0 each.

Could you please provide your RFID Number (6 digits - located at back bottom right of your NYU card after the + sign), Building Number, Phone Number (UAE format), and any special requests for your order?
